CommonPAFAddress.description: Australian address formatted according to the file format defined by the [PAF file format](https://auspost.com.au/content/dam/auspost_corp/media/documents/australia-post-data-guide.pdf). Required if addressUType is set to paf

dpid.description: Unique identifier for an address as defined by Australia Post.  Also known as Delivery Point Identifier

flatUnitType.description: Type of flat or unit for the address

floorLevelNumber.description: Floor or level number (including alpha characters)

floorLevelType.description: Type of floor or level for the address

postalDeliveryNumber.description: Postal delivery number if the address is a postal delivery type

postalDeliveryNumberPrefix.description: Postal delivery number prefix related to the postal delivery number

postalDeliveryNumberSuffix.description: Postal delivery number suffix related to the postal delivery number

postalDeliveryType.description: Postal delivery type. (eg. PO BOX). Valid enumeration defined by Australia Post PAF code file

state.description: State in which the address belongs. Valid enumeration defined by Australia Post PAF code file [State Type Abbreviation](https://auspost.com.au/content/dam/auspost_corp/media/documents/australia-post-data-guide.pdf). NSW, QLD, VIC, NT, WA, SA, TAS, ACT, AAT

streetSuffix.description: The street type suffix. Valid enumeration defined by Australia Post PAF code file

streetType.description: The street type. Valid enumeration defined by Australia Post PAF code file

thoroughfareNumber1.description: Thoroughfare number for a property (first number in a property ranged address)

thoroughfareNumber1Suffix.description: Suffix for the thoroughfare number. Only relevant is thoroughfareNumber1 is populated

thoroughfareNumber2.description: Second thoroughfare number (only used if the property has a ranged address eg 23-25)

thoroughfareNumber2Suffix.description: Suffix for the second thoroughfare number. Only relevant is thoroughfareNumber2 is populated

addressUType.description: The type of address object present

CommonSimpleAddress.description: Required if addressUType is set to simple

addressLine1.description: First line of the standard address object

addressLine2.description: Second line of the standard address object

addressLine3.description: Third line of the standard address object

city.description: Name of the city or locality

country.description: A valid [ISO 3166 Alpha-3](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html) country code. Australia (AUS) is assumed if country is not present.

mailingName.description: Name of the individual or business formatted for inclusion in an address used for physical mail

state.description: Free text if the country is not Australia. If country is Australia then must be one of the values defined by the [State Type Abbreviation](https://auspost.com.au/content/dam/auspost_corp/media/documents/australia-post-data-guide.pdf) in the PAF file format. NSW, QLD, VIC, NT, WA, SA, TAS, ACT, AAT

self.description: Fully qualified link that generated the current response document

first.description: URI to the first page of this set. Mandatory if this response is not the first page

last.description: URI to the last page of this set. Mandatory if this response is not the last page

next.description: URI to the next page of this set. Mandatory if this response is not the last page

prev.description: URI to the previous page of this set. Mandatory if this response is not the first page

self.description: Fully qualified link that generated the current response document

MetaError.description: Additional data for customised error codes

urn.description: The CDR error code URN which the application-specific error code extends. Mandatory if the error `code` is an application-specific error rather than a standardised error code.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages in the full set. See [pagination](#pagination).

totalRecords.description: The total number of records in the full set. See [pagination](#pagination).

code.description: The code of the error encountered. Where the error is specific to the respondent, an application-specific error code, expressed as a string value. If the error is application-specific, the URN code that the specific error extends must be provided in the meta object. Otherwise, the value is the error code URN.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem that MUST NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem represented by the error code.

TelcoAccount.description: The array of plans containing services and associated plan details

plans.description: The array of plans containing service and associated plan details

accountId.description: The ID of the account. To be created in accordance with [CDR ID permanence](#id-permanence) requirements

accountNumber.description: Masked identifier of the account as defined by the data holder. This must be the value presented on physical statements (required if it exists) and must not be used for the value of the accountId

brand.description: The retail name of the brand

creationDate.description: The date that the account was created or opened. Mandatory if openStatus is OPEN

displayName.description: An optional display name for the account if one exists or can be derived. The content of this field is at the discretion of the data holder

lastUpdated.description: The date and time which the account was last updated

openStatus.description: Open or closed status for the account. If not present then OPEN is assumed

TelcoAccountDetail.description: The array of plans containing services and associated plan details

plans.description: The array of plans containing services and associated plan details

firstName.description: For people with single names this field need not be present. The single name should be in the lastName field

lastName.description: For people with single names the single name should be in this field

middleNames.description: Field is mandatory but array may be empty

prefix.description: Also known as title or salutation. The prefix to the name (e.g. Mr, Mrs, Ms, Miss, Sir, etc)

suffix.description: Used for a trailing suffix to the name (e.g. Jr)

billingType.description: The billing type of then plan

nickname.description: Optional display name for the plan provided by the customer to help differentiate multiple plans

serviceIds.description: The serviceId representing a unique service identifier such as a mobile [MSISDN](https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_gts/03/0303/05.00.00_60/gsmts_0303v050000p.pdf), [FNN](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf) or internet service e.g [NBN AVC Service ID](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf). In accordance with [CDR ID permanence](#id-permanence) requirement

type.description: The type of the plan. The type of plan. A [MOBILE](https://www.legislation.gov.au/Details/C2022C00170/Html/Volume_1#_Toc95898745) service or BROADBAND fixed internet service

TelcoAccountPlanDetail.description: Detail on the plan applicable to this account. Mandatory if openStatus is OPEN

charges.description: Charges for metering included in the plan

displayName.description: The name of the plan if one exists

endDate.description: The end date of the applicability of this plan

startDate.description: The start date of the applicability of this plan

accountId.description: Tokenised ID of the account. In accordance with [CDR ID permanence](#id-permanence) requirements

services.description: List of services that are part of the account

TelcoAdditionalInformation.description: Object that contains links to additional information on specific topics

bundleUri.description: A link to detail on bundles that this plan can be a part of

eligibilityUri.description: A link to detail on eligibility criteria for the plan

overviewUri.description: A link to a general overview of the plan

pricingUri.description: A link to detail on pricing for the plan

termsUri.description: A link to terms and conditions for the plan

TelcoBalance.description: Object containing account service usage summary

accountId.description: The ID of the account. In accordance with [CDR ID permanence](#id-permanence) requirements

adjustments.description: Optional array of adjustments arising for this transaction

amount.description: The amount charged or credited for this transaction prior to any adjustments being applied.  A negative value indicates a credit

description.description: Optional description of the transaction that can be used for display purposes

endDate.description: Date and time when the usage period ends

invoiceNumber.description: The number of the invoice in which this transaction is included if it has been issued

serviceIds.description: Array list of services identifiers to which this transaction applies if any. E.g. a mobile [MSISDN](https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_gts/03/0303/05.00.00_60/gsmts_0303v050000p.pdf), [FNN](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf) or internet service e.g [NBN AVC Service ID](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf). In accordance with [CDR ID permanence](#id-permanence) requirements

startDate.description: Date and time when the usage period starts

amount.description: The amount of the adjustment

description.description: A free text description of the adjustment

amount.description: The amount of the charge or credit.  A positive value indicates a charge and a negative value indicates a credit

description.description: A free text description of the item

invoiceNumber.description: The number of the invoice in which this transaction is included if it has been issued

serviceId.description: The ID of the service identifier to which this transaction applies if any. E.g a [MSISDN](https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_gts/03/0303/05.00.00_60/gsmts_0303v050000p.pdf), [FNN](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf) or internet service e.g [NBN AVC Service ID](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf). In accordance with [CDR ID permanence](#id-permanence) requirements

adjustments.description: Optional array of adjustments arising for this transaction

amount.description: The amount of the charge

description.description: A free text description of the item

endDate.description: Optional end date for the application of the charge

invoiceNumber.description: The number of the invoice in which this transaction is included if it has been issued

serviceId.description: The service identifier to which this transaction applies if any. E.g a mobile [MSISDN](https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_gts/03/0303/05.00.00_60/gsmts_0303v050000p.pdf), [FNN](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf) or internet service e.g [NBN AVC Service ID](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf). In accordance with [CDR ID permanence](#id-permanence) requirements

startDate.description: Optional start date for the application of the charge

type.description: Type of charge. Assumed to be OTHER if absent

amount.description: The amount paid

accountId.description: The ID of the account for which the transaction occurred. accountId must comply in accordance with [CDR ID permanence](#id-permanence)

executionDateTime.description: The date and time that the transaction occurred

gst.description: The GST incurred in the transaction.  Should not be included for credits or payments.  If absent zero is assumed

transactionUType.description: Indicator of the type of transaction object present in this record

additionalInfo.description: Display text providing more information on the concession

additionalInfoUri.description: Optional link to additional information regarding the concession

amount.description: Conditional attribute for the amount of discount for the concession- required if type is FIXED_AMOUNT

appliedTo.description: Array of ENUM's to specify what the concession applies to. Multiple ENUM values can be provided. If absent, USAGE is assumed

discountFrequency.description: Conditional attribute for frequency at which a concession is applied. Required if type is FIXED_AMOUNT or FIXED_PERCENTAGE. Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax)

displayName.description: The display name of the concession

endDate.description: Optional end date for the application of the concession

percentage.description: Conditional attribute for the percentage of discount of concession - required if type is FIXED_PERCENTAGE

startDate.description: Optional start date for the application of the concession

concessions.description: Array may be empty if no concessions exist

TelcoContract.description: Summary of the contract details. Mandatory if the billing type is POST_PAID and a contract agreement is required with the service provider for the plan

description.description: Description of the contract

accountId.description: The ID of the account for which the invoice was issued. accountId must comply in accordance with [CDR ID permanence](#id-permanence)

balanceAtIssue.description: The account balance at the time the invoice was issued

dueDate.description: The date that the invoice is due to be paid

gstAmount.description: The total GST amount for this invoice.  If absent then zero is assumed

invoiceAmount.description: The net amount due for this invoice regardless of previous balance

invoiceNumber.description: The number assigned to this invoice by the telco Retailer

issueDate.description: The date that the invoice was actually issued (as opposed to generated or calculated)

paymentStatus.description: Indicator of the payment status for the invoice

services.description: An array of service IDs to which this invoice applies. May be empty if the invoice contains no usage related charges

TelcoInvoiceAccountCharges.description: Object contain charges and credits related to usage

totalDiscounts.description: The aggregate total of account level discounts or credits for the period covered by the invoice

totalGst.description: The total GST for all account level charges.  If absent then zero is assumed

totalOnceOffCharges.description: The aggregate total of any once off charges arising from usage for the period covered by the invoice (exclusive of GST)

totalUsageCharges.description: The aggregate total of usage charges for the period covered by the invoice (exclusive of GST)

TelcoInvoiceAccountChargesOtherCharges.description: Optional array of charges that may be part of the invoice (for example services fees) (exclusive of GST)

amount.description: The aggregate total of charges for this item (exclusive of GST)

description.description: A free text description of the charge

type.description: A free text description of the charge

invoices.description: Array of invoices sorted by issue date in descending order

TelcoInvoicePayOnTimeDiscount.description: A discount for on time payment

date.description: The date by which the invoice must be paid to receive the pay on time discount

discountAmount.description: The amount that will be discounted if the invoice is paid by the date specified

gstAmount.description: The GST amount that will be discounted if the invoice is paid by the date specified.  If absent then zero is assumed

TelcoInvoicePeriod.description: Object containing the start and end date for the period covered by the invoice. Mandatory if any usage based charges are included in the invoice

endDate.description: The end date of the period covered by this invoice

startDate.description: The start date of the period covered by this invoice

amount.description: Optional payment amount indicating that a constant payment amount is scheduled to be paid (used in bill smoothing scenarios)

paymentScheduleUType.description: The type of object present in this response

TelcoPaymentScheduleCardDebit.description: Represents a regular credit card payment schedule. Mandatory if paymentScheduleUType is set to cardDebit

calculationType.description:
The mechanism by which the payment amount is calculated. Explanation of values are as follows:
  • **STATIC** - Indicates a consistent, static amount, per payment
  • **BALANCE** - Indicates that the outstanding balance for the account is paid per period
  • **CALCULATED** - Indicates that the payment amount is variable and calculated using a pre-defined algorithm

cardScheme.description: The type of credit card held on file

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency that payments will occur.  Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax)

TelcoPaymentScheduleDigitalWallet.description: Represents a regular payment from a digital wallet. Mandatory if paymentScheduleUType is set to digitalWallet

calculationType.description:
The mechanism by which the payment amount is calculated. Explanation of values are as follows:
  • **STATIC** - Indicates a consistent, static amount, per payment
  • **BALANCE** - Indicates that the outstanding balance for the account is paid per period
  • **CALCULATED** - Indicates that the payment amount is variable and calculated using a pre-defined algorithm

identifier.description: The identifier of the digital wallet (dependent on type)

name.description: The display name of the wallet as given by the customer, else a default value defined by the data holder

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency that payments will occur.  Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax)

provider.description: The provider of the digital wallet

type.description: The type of the digital wallet identifier

TelcoPaymentScheduleDirectDebit.description: Represents a regular direct debit from a specified bank account. Mandatory if paymentScheduleUType is set to directDebit

accountNumber.description: The unmasked account number for the account to be debited. Is expected to be formatted as digits only with leading zeros included and no punctuation or spaces.  Is required if isTokenised is absent or false

bsb.description: The unmasked BSB for the account to be debited. Is expected to be formatted as digits only with leading zeros included and no punctuation or spaces.  Is required if isTokenised is absent or false

calculationType.description:
The mechanism by which the payment amount is calculated. Explanation of values are as follows:
  • **STATIC** - Indicates a consistent, static amount, per payment
  • **BALANCE** - Indicates that the outstanding balance for the account is paid per period
  • **CALCULATED** - Indicates that the payment amount is variable and calculated using a pre-defined algorithm

isTokenised.description: Flag indicating that the account details are tokenised and cannot be shared.  False if absent

paymentFrequency.description: The frequency that payments will occur.  Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax)

TelcoPaymentScheduleManualPayment.description: Represents a manual payment schedule where the customer pays in response to a delivered statement. Mandatory if paymentScheduleUType is set to manualPayment

billFrequency.description: The frequency with which a bill will be issued.  Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax)

paymentSchedules.description: Array may be empty if no payment schedule exist

TelcoPlanType.description: Plan type for this feature. METERED: A plan is charged by usage for the feature. UNMETERED: A plan with no limits for a feature. LIMITED: Where plan limit inclusions apply. UNSUPPORTED: Feature is not supported

applicationUri.description: A link to an application web page where this plan can be applied for

brand.description: The ID of the brand under which this product is offered

brandName.description: The display name of the brand under which this product is offered

bundle.description: Required if part of a bundle. If not present FALSE is assumed

description.description: A description of the product

displayName.description: The display name of the product

effectiveFrom.description: The date and time from which this product is effective (ie. is available for origination). Used to enable the articulation of products to the regime before they are available for customers to originate

effectiveTo.description: The date and time at which this product will be retired and will no longer be offered. Used to enable the managed deprecation of plans

lastUpdated.description: The last date and time that the information for this plan was changed (or the creation date for the plan if it has never been altered)

pricing.description: List of pricing details for the product plan

productId.description: The ID of the specific product

purpose.description: The purpose type of the product. If absent, then the value PERSONAL is assumed

thirdPartyAgentId.description: The ID of the Third Party through which this product may be originated

thirdPartyAgentName.description: The display name of the Third Party through which this product may be originated

type.description: The type of product. [MOBILE](https://www.legislation.gov.au/Details/C2022C00170/Html/Volume_1#_Toc95898745) service or BROADBAND fixed internet service

bundles.description: Bundles the product can be part of

meteringCharges.description: Charges for metering included in the plan

bundleUri.description: The URI of the product bundle

description.description: The description of the product bundle

displayName.description: The display name of the product bundle

features.description: Optional list of features of the bundle

description.description: The description of the discount feature

displayName.description: The display name of the discount feature

description.description: The description name of the product plan

displayName.description: The display name of the product plan

features.description: Optional list of features of the discount

description.description: The description of the feature

displayName.description: The display name of the feature

description.description: The description of the incentive feature

displayName.description: The display name of the incentive feature

description.description: The description of the incentive

displayName.description: The display name of the incentive

features.description: Optional list of features of the incentive

description.description: Description of the charge

maximumValue.description: The upper limit of the charge if the charge could occur in a range

minimumValue.description: Minimum value of the charge if the charge is a range or the absolute value of the charge if no range is specified

period.description: The charges that occur on a schedule indicates the frequency. Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax)

description.description: The display name of the product plan

displayName.description: The display name of the product plan

features.description: Optional list of features of the plan

planUri.description: The URI of the product plan

description.description: The description of the feature

displayName.description: The display name of the feature

amount.description: The amount charged for the duration period

description.description: The description of the pricing

name.description: The display name of the pricing

period.description: The duration that occurs on a pricing schedule indicates the frequency. Formatted according to [ISO 8601 Durations](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601#Durations) (excludes recurrence syntax)

displayName.description: Optional description of the service used for display purposes

endDate.description: Date when the balance period ends

phoneNumber.description: Required if the service includes a phone number

serviceId.description: The serviceId representing a unique service identifier such as a mobile [MSISDN](https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_gts/03/0303/05.00.00_60/gsmts_0303v050000p.pdf), [FNN](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf) or internet service e.g [NBN AVC Service ID](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf). In accordance with [CDR ID permanence](#id-permanence) requirements

startDate.description: Date when the balance period started

amount.description: Remaining value amount of data available. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

description.description: An overview of plan limits. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED

download.description: Remaining download data in megabytes (MB). Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

upload.description: Remaining upload data in megabytes (MB). Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

TelcoServiceBalanceDataRoaming.description: Balance of data roaming charges. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED

amount.description: Amount value of data roaming charges. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED

description.description: An overview of plan limits. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED

download.description: Amount of data used overseas in megabytes (MB). Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED

TelcoServiceBalanceMessaging.description: Summary of messaging. Required if messaging services is included in the product plan

TelcoServiceBalanceMessagingMms.description: Summary of MMS Balance. Required if the service plan supports MMS messaging

amount.description: Amount value of MMS messages remaining. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

description.description: An overview of plan limits. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED

international.description: Number of international MMS messages remaining. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

national.description: Number of national MMS messages remaining. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

roaming.description: Number of roaming MMS messages remaining. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

TelcoServiceBalanceMessagingSms.description: Summary of SMS Balance. Required if the service plan supports SMS messaging

amount.description: Amount value of SMS messages remaining. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

description.description: An overview of plan limits. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED

international.description: Number of international SMS messages remaining. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

national.description: Number of national SMS messages remaining. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

roaming.description: Number of roaming SMS messages remaining. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

TelcoServiceBalanceVoice.description: Summary of voice balances. Required if voice calls are included in product plan

amount.description: Amount value of international calls available. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

description.description: An overview of plan limits. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED

duration.description: Total duration (hours, minutes, and seconds) of international voice calls available. Not limited to 24hrs. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

number.description: Number of international voice calls available Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

amount.description: Amount balance of national calls. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

description.description: An overview of plan limits. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED

duration.description: Total duration (hours, minutes, and seconds) of national voice calls. Not limited to 24hrs. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

number.description: Number of national voice calls. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

amount.description: Amount value of roaming calls available. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

description.description: An overview of plan limits. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED

duration.description: Total duration (hours, minutes, and seconds) of roaming voice calls available. Not limited to 24hrs. Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

number.description: Number of roaming voice calls available Required unless planType is UNSUPPORTED or UNMETERED

serviceId.description: The tokenised ID of the service identifier for use in the CDR APIs. E.g a mobile [MSISDN](https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_gts/03/0303/05.00.00_60/gsmts_0303v050000p.pdf), [FNN](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf) or internet service e.g [NBN AVC Service ID](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf).  Created according to the CDR rules for [CDR ID permanence](#id-permanence)

displayName.description: Optional description of the service used for display purposes

endDate.description: Date when the usage period ends

phoneNumber.description: Required if the service includes a phone number

serviceId.description: Tokenised ID of the service identifier. E.g. a mobile [MSISDN](https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_gts/03/0303/05.00.00_60/gsmts_0303v050000p.pdf), [FNN](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf) or internet service e.g [NBN AVC Service ID](https://www.nbnco.com.au/content/dam/nbnco2/documents/sfaa-wba2-dictionary_FTTN-launch.pdf). To be created in accordance with [CDR ID permanence](#id-permanence) requirements

startDate.description: Date when the usage period started

transactions.description: Array of transactions sorted by date and time in descending order

amount.description: Amount value of data roaming charges

download.description: Amount of data used while roaming in megabytes (MB)

amount.description: Cost amount of data usage

download.description: Amount of data downloaded in megabytes (MB)

upload.description: Amount of data uploaded in megabytes (MB)

TelcoUsageMessaging.description: Summary of messaging. Required if messaging services is included in the product plan

amount.description: Cost amount of MMS messages

international.description: ber of international MMS messages sent

national.description: Number of national MMS messages sent

roaming.description: Number of roaming SMS messages sent. Including premium SMS services

amount.description: Cost amount of SMS messages. Including premium SMS services

international.description: Number of international SMS messages sent. Including premium SMS services

national.description: Number of national SMS messages sent. Including premium SMS services

roaming.description: Number of roaming SMS messages sent. Including premium SMS services

TelcoUsageVoice.description: Summary of voice calls. Required if voice calls are included in product plan

TelcoUsageVoiceInternational.description: International voice calls. Requied if international calling is supported

amount.description: Cost amount of international voice calls

duration.description: Total duration (hours, minutes, and seconds) of international voice calls. Not limited to 24hrs

amount.description: Cost amount of national calls

duration.description: Total duration (hours, minutes, and seconds) of national voice calls. Not limited to 24hrs

TelcoUsageVoiceRoaming.description: Roaming voice calls, Required if roaming is supported

amount.description: Cost amount of roaming voice calls

duration.description: Total duration (hours, minutes, and seconds) of roaming voice calls. Not limited to 24hrs
